t:
“Ouch!” my sister yelled after biting into her food, “the center is way too hot.”




“Ew!” I replied, “look, it's crawling with billions of fleshy biped creatures.
  Here, try my gas giant instead.”
c:
We're saving the hot yellow soup for last.



#food #hot #hungry #eating #sister #crawl #scifi #alien





The implication here is that, some larger-than-planets aliens are eating our solar system.
